inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory women older than 60 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to take study drug and participate for four years in the trial
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Use of medications that influence bone metabolism (e.g. anticonvulsants)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Significant deviation from normal in either: history, physical examination or laboratory tests as evaluated by the Principle Investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participation in another investigational trial 30 days prior to screening
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: BMD total hip below - 2.5 standard deviation (using NHANES III adult young white men and women as the point of reference) or history of osteoporotic fracture
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, but no other exclusion criteria are mentioned.
